---
category: news
title: "UAE: Machine learning, AI to enhance rainfall in the region"
excerpt: "The new rain enhancement projects in the UAE will use artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning and ‘Hygroscopic Nano-materials’ to address water shortages, it has been announced. The two winning projects for the fourth cycle were announced on Thursday by the UAE Research Program for Rain Enhancement Science at a special ceremony held at Expo 2020 Dubai."
